# EZ899-241616: Cell Window Glazing Replacement at Kent Institution, Agassiz, BC

* **Amendment Number**: 0 (No amendments)

## Procurement Details

### UN/SPEC Codes
* **UN/SPEC Code**: 72152400 (Window and door installation and erection services)
* **UN/SPEC Code**: 72153000 (Glass and glazing services)

* **Category**: CNST
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding

### Contractor and Workplace Information
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **End-User Entity**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)

### Project Description
The work under this requirement comprises the glazing replacement and installation of polycarbonate external layers over windows of 384 cells at Kent Institution, Agassiz, BC.

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: March 29, 2024

* **Project Duration**: 42 weeks
